Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I play KSP...alot. Quite a bit. Frequently. With regularity. Etc. And none of my friends appreciate it like I do. So I have no one to laugh at my explosions. Are there any relatively small groups that play a lot of KSP? Y'know, three to six people or so. Just wondering.

Thanks.
I think we had a team speak or a mumble but it's thread got devoured by the kraken in the forum crash.
